src:
[Video] Estaba tan ebrio que se fue de cara contra el piso en pleno programa en vivo
El hombre se levantó de su silla e intentó abandonar el set desde donde se transmitía 'La Vida Moderna', un programa de radio español de la Cadena SER.

02 Nov 2019, 10:30

Un video que circula en redes muestra que el sujeto, que hacía parte del público, tambaleó mientras caminaba hacia la salida y se cayó justo cuando pasaba frente a los locutores, que quedaron sorprendidos por lo ocurrido.
“¡Está que se cae!, está borracho… ¿qué hace?”, manifestaron los panelistas mientras veían al hombre caminando de manera inestable. “Va a vomitar”, dijo uno de ellos, poco antes de que se registrara la caída.
El hecho, que se difundió profusamente en redes, desató risas de cientos de internautas.
A continuación, el video:
text:
[Video] He was so drunk that he went face-to-face on the floor in full live program
The man got up from his chair and tried to leave the set from where 'La Vida Moderna' was broadcast, a Spanish radio program of the Cadena SER.

02 Nov 2019, 10:30

A video circulating in networks shows that the subject, who was part of the audience, staggered as he walked towards the exit and fell just as he passed in front of the speakers, who were surprised by what happened.
"He is falling! He is drunk ... what does he do?" The panelists said as they watched the man walking unstably. "He's going to throw up," said one of them, shortly before the fall was recorded.
The fact, which spread widely in networks, unleashed laughter from hundreds of Internet users.
Then the video:
